LanguageData.VFEE.StartBestower.NoThrone: Unable to start due to {0} not having a dignified throne.
LanguageData.VFEE.StartBestower.NoTarget: Unable to start due to no valid throne rooms for the bestowing of the title.
LanguageData.VFEE.StartBestower.HigherTitle: Unable to start due to target already possesing a higher title
LanguageData.VFEE.StartBestower.DisabledExistingRitua: Unable to start while an existing ritual is ongoing.
LanguageData.VFEE.BallroomRequirements.DanceFloorToSm: Ballroom does not have a big enough dance floor for the guests! They would like an open floor space of {0} infront of an instrument
LanguageData.VFEE.GrandBall.Label: Grandball
LanguageData.VFEE.GrandBall.Leave.label: Leave Grandball
LanguageData.VFEE.GrandBall.Leave.Desc: This pawn will leave the grandball, they will not be able to rejoin the festivities later
LanguageData.VFEE.GrandBall.Cancel.Label: Cancel Grandball
LanguageData.VFEE.GrandBall.Cancel.Desc: Cancel the grand ball sending everyone home and failing the quest
LanguageData.VFEE.GrandBall.Cancel.Confirm: There will be no opportunity to restart this ritual, your guests will go home unappy and the quest will be failed.
LanguageData.VFEE.GrandBall.Waiting: Your guests are waiting for you to start the grand ball. They wont wait long however
LanguageData.VFEE.GrandBall.Description: An exclusive ball to only be attended by those with a royal title, and a few who can play instruments
LanguageData.VFEE.ArtExhibit.Label: Art Exhibit
LanguageData.VFEE.ArtExhibit.Leave.label: Leave exhibit
LanguageData.VFEE.ArtExhibit.Leave.Desc: This pawn will leave the exhibit, they will not be able to rejoin the festivities later
LanguageData.VFEE.ArtExhibit.Cancel.Label: Cancel Exhibit
LanguageData.VFEE.ArtExhibit.Cancel.Desc: Cancel the art exhibit sending everyone home and failing the quest
LanguageData.VFEE.ArtExhibit.Cancel.Confirm: There will be no opportunity to restart this ritual, your guests will go home unappy and the quest will be failed.
LanguageData.VFEE.ArtExhibit.Waiting: Your guests are waiting for you to start the art exhibit. They wont wait long however
LanguageData.VFEE.ArtExhibit.Description: An art expedition to only be attended by those with a royal title, to view your galley and gossip with eachother.
LanguageData.VFEE.Parade.Murder: Driven by jealousy {0} is attempting to murder the stellarch!
LanguageData.VFEE.Parade.Label: Parade
LanguageData.VFEE.Parade.Leave.label: Leave Parade
LanguageData.VFEE.Parade.Leave.Desc: This pawn will leave the Parade, they will not be able to rejoin the festivities later
LanguageData.VFEE.Parade.Cancel.Label: Cancel Parade
LanguageData.VFEE.Parade.Cancel.Desc: Cancel the parade sending everyone home and failing the quest
LanguageData.VFEE.Parade.Cancel.Confirm: There will be no opportunity to restart this ritual, your guests will go home unhappy and the quest will be failed.
LanguageData.VFEE.Parade.Waiting: Your guests are waiting for you to start the Parade. They wont wait long however
LanguageData.VFEE.Parade.Description: A traditional ascension parade to send off the stellarch!
LanguageData.VFEE.Parade.InvalidGuard: The stellarch does not trust {0} enough.
LanguageData.VFEE.Parade.LandingAreaUnmet: Unable to find a suitable drop beacon for the guests to land their shuttle at
LanguageData.VFEE.Parade.Reward.Label: Stellarch Ascension
LanguageData.VFEE.Parade.Reward.Description: Your Stellarch will achieve ascension with passage off world to progress further in the grand hierachy, serving directly with the emperor
LanguageData.VFEE.AssassinationSuccess: Deserters are leaving as they have eliminated their target.
LanguageData.VFEE.RoyaltyDead: Deserters are leaving as they have eliminated every imperial title holder in the area.
LanguageData.VFEE.GotDrug: {0} has sent you a celebration package of aperitif!
LanguageData.VFEE.TitheArrived: The tithe of {0} has arrived from {1}.
